content: To summon the First Prince of Flowing Sands, you will first need to defeat King of Flowing Sand and Second Rat Prince. They are a mandatory boss, so you can't miss them. From there, you can then use the Pungent Flesh Chunk to summon the First Prince of Flowing Sands.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Arhat_Gold_Piece.md', within the main section titled 'Arhat Gold Piece'.
The content is as follows:
To summon the First Prince of Flowing Sands, you will first need to defeat King of Flowing Sand and Second Rat Prince. They are a mandatory boss, so you can't miss them. From there, you can then use the Pungent Flesh Chunk to summon the First Prince of Flowing Sands.
